description: Soft and lightweight undies with a lacey knit pattern for increased breathability. Temperature-regulating merino dries quickly and feels great against your skin for comfort on the trail or at your desk.Made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend with lace knit details.Nylon core for increased durability while keeping the soft merino wool next to your skin.Soft elastic waistband creates a flattering fit.
name: Smartwool Merino 150 Lace Bikini - Women's
